Posts.Content: Jan 21, 2016 09:29PM dlyn wrote: I had the same diagnosis as you 12 yrs ago. The best advice I can give you is support groups and Susan Koman's book. It really helped me understand what I was going through. No one in my family had never had any type of cancer. You are in my prayers.
Posts.Title: Just diagnosed/overwhelmed and sad. mmshea Katp712
